abstract: Pennsylvania Atty Gen Kathleen G Kane will stand trial on charges of leaking grand jury information and perjury; if convicted, Democrat could serve seven years.
lead_paragraph: Kathleen G. Kane, the state attorney general, on Monday was ordered to trial on charges that she leaked grand jury information to the press and lied under oath about it.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Attorney General Ordered to Trial
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Attorney General Ordered to Trial

snippet: Kathleen G. Kane, the state attorney general, on Monday was ordered to trial on charges that she leaked grand jury information to the press and lied under oath about it.
